member_organisations:
ICT has around 25 permanent staff in its different offices.  
we have 150.000 members worldwide who support our work including by donating to the organization.
fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Trade, Culture, International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Climate Action
inter_groups: We follow the activities of the Intergroup on religious freedom
eu_initiatives:
ICT is following EU's foreign Policy towards China but also India and Nepal where are based Tibetan communities.  
ICT is monitoring the activities of the European Commission, the European Parliament, the EU Council, the EEAS and the EESC.  
Areas of interest for ICT are also development policies, EIDHR, budget issues, environmental issues.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Our NGO is member of FIDH (Fédération Internationale des Ligues des Droits de l'Homme)
relevant_communication: ICT follows the EU Action Plan on Human Rights and all public relations and communication of the EU on China.
